module: Module-level comment: This module generates glyphs for menu screens based on input signals. It uses nested case statements to handle different menu states (0, 1, 2) and creates various visual elements like borders, text, and selectable options. The module processes screen coordinates, menu selection, and filter options to output a 14-bit glyph value, where the lower 8 bits represent pixel coordinates and the upper 6 bits encode visual elements or characters.
